```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(httr)
library(haven)
```


## Smoking data

```{r, eval = FALSE}

data = read_sas("NYATS_2003_2019_PublicUse.sas7bdat")

#names(data)

nyc_08_19 = data%>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  filter(nyc == 1,
         year > 2007)

write_csv(nyc_08_19,"data/nyc_08_19")
```
